document_data.name: CalagraceIt is unknown whether she used the last name Dawntanthra.
document_data.mainbody: '''Calagrace''' was a minor mage, and the mother of [[Irithra Dawntanthra]]. She fled her native [[Calimshan]] for the islands in the [[Moonshaes]] to avoid an arranged marriage. She died at some point before {{yearlink|612}} of a winter fever; before then, she scried extensively.
